info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:23PM MDT until June 03 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 323 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pastura, or 15 miles northeast of Vaughn, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pastura. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
